articles.description: The Dutch Eredivisie season has been ended with immediate effect, meaning league leaders Ajax have been denied the title.
articles.content:
No top-flight league title will be awarded in the Netherlands after the COVID-19 pandemic brought the campaign to a premature close but Ajax Amsterdam and AZ Alkmaar will qualify for next season's Champions League, Dutch media reported on Friday.
